# Strategy: BB-XM NASDAQ-X ||| Deez ||| 29JUN2023
Source: https://app.composer.trade/symphony/1hoPN3tFE0aDY3aiZtxT/details

**Complexity**: High (9/10)
**Description**: Believe
**Category**: Tactical

## Trading Universe
This strategy can trade 31 assets:

• **Stocks**: BIL, SOXX, SPY, UVXY, VIXY, SOXL, SOXS, VIXM, TECL, TNA, SPXL, MSFT, AAPL, GD, RTX, NOC, AMZN, GOOGL, META, PEP, MSTR, NVDA, TSLA, AMD, INTC, NFLX, AMGN, CSCO, TMUS, AVGO, SBUX

## Strategy Settings
• **Rebalancing**: No regular rebalancing
• **Initial Capital**: USD 100,000
• **Trading Fees**: 0.10% per trade

## Investment Logic

```
• Equal Weight Allocation:
  ◦ ?? V 0.1a | Minimal BB | Simple Beta Baller Signal (Invest Copy):
    ▪ Equal Weight Allocation:
      - If :
        - If BIL's RSI (Relative Strength Index) (10-day) is less than SOXX's RSI (Relative Strength Index) (10-day):
          - Equal Weight Allocation:
            - If :
              - If SPY's RSI (Relative Strength Index) (6-day) is greater than 75.0:
                - Overbought S&P. Sell the rip. Buy volatility.:
                  - Equal Weight Allocation:
                    - Select the bottom 1 asset by RSI (Relative Strength Index) (13-day) from: UVXY, VIXY
              - Else branch:
                - Equal Weight Allocation:
                  - Buy SOXL (100% of portfolio)
        - Else branch:
          - ? SOXX RSI Machine | Deez | 15NOV2022:
            - Equal Weight Allocation:
              - If :
                - If SOXX's RSI (Relative Strength Index) (10-day) is greater than 76.0:
                  - Equal Weight Allocation:
                    - Buy SOXS (100% of portfolio)
                - Else branch:
                  - Equal Weight Allocation:
                    - If :
                      - If SOXX's RSI (Relative Strength Index) (2-day) is less than 42.0:
                        - Equal Weight Allocation:
                          - If :
                            - If SOXL's RSI (Relative Strength Index) (10-day) is less than 57.0:
                              - Buy SOXL (100% of portfolio)
                            - Else branch:
                              - Buy SOXS (100% of portfolio)
                      - Else branch:
                        - V 1.2 | ?? NASDAQ-X DeETF | Deez | AR: 83% DD: 25.6% - 1JAN2019:
                          - Equal Weight Allocation:
                            - If :
                              - If SPY's RSI (Relative Strength Index) (14-day) is greater than 77.0:
                                - Equal Weight Allocation:
                                  - Buy VIXM (100% of portfolio)
                              - Else branch:
                                - Equal Weight Allocation:
                                  - If :
                                    - If SPY's RSI (Relative Strength Index) (14-day) is less than 30.0:
                                      - Equal Weight Allocation:
                                        - Select the top 2 assets by cumulative-return (45-day) from: TECL, TNA, SPXL
                                    - Else branch:
                                      - Equal Weight Allocation:
                                        - Select the top 3 assets by RSI (Relative Strength Index) (46-day)
```
